author: hlship
msg: TAP5-116: Turn of live service reloading during tests of all modules except tapestry-ioc

author: suresh
msg: HDFS-1842. Handle editlog opcode conflict with 0.20.203 during upgrade, by throwing an error to indicate the editlog needs to be empty. Contributed by Suresh Srinivas.

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3042: When a filter or consumer added Attributes to a TokenStream chain after it was already (partly) consumed [or clearAttributes(), captureState(), cloneAttributes(),... was called by the Tokenizer], the Tokenizer calling clearAttributes() or capturing state after addition may not do this on the newly added Attribute

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3042: Add a more specific test that can be backported to 3.x and prev

author: acmurthy
msg: MAPREDUCE-2447. Fix Child.java to set Task.jvmContext sooner to avoid corner cases in error handling. Contributed by Siddharth Seth.
